Name: Recruit One
About the game: At Lightway Lines , we’re looking for the top candidates to join us on our maiden voyage to the stars. You’ve made it this far, but have you got what it takes to go even further, Recruit One? Against the clock, you must prove yourself worthy of crew status aboard Lightway Lines by completing a series of challenges devised by the greatest scientific minds in space tourism. Good luck, Recruit One . You’re going to need it. Navigate through over 20 varied and challenging levels. Use your initiative to traverse deadly environments – one wrong step means certain failure. Solve puzzles & find the hidden challenge; prove you’re worthy of the title: Recruit One . Be the best – race against the clock to achieve 1 of 6 final grades. Display an optional timer on-screen, and take a shot at speedrunning the game! Prepare yourself for the full Lightway Lines game , coming soon. Are you ready to prove to us you’re the candidate we're looking for?
